DOC.detailed_description: This protocol collectively address follow goal : 1 ) What change gene expression osteoblast osteocytes lead impaired bone formation age ; 2 ) Since recent work investigator ' group demonstrate osteoclast produce number growth factor cytokine ( couple factor ) enhance osteoblast proliferation and/or differentiation , age associate reduced osteoclast couple factor production ; 3 ) If osteoclast markedly reduce use FDA-approved medication osteoporosis , denosumab , effect quantity couple factor bone microenvironment target gene couple factor osteoblast ?
DOC.criteria: normal premenopausal woman age 2540 year normal postmenopausal woman age 6080 year least 5 yr since last menses follicle stimulate hormone ( FSH ) > 20 IU/L Abnormality screen laboratory study Presence significant liver renal disease Malignancy ( include myeloma ) Malabsorption Diabetes Hypoparathyroidism Hyperparathyroidism Acromegaly Cushing 's syndrome Hypopituitarism Severe chronic obstructive pulmonary disease Undergoing treatment medication affect bone turnover , include follow : adrenocorticosteroids ( > 3 month time > 10 day within previous yr ) anticonvulsant therapy ( within previous year ) pharmacological dos thyroid hormone ( cause decline thyroid stimulate hormone normal ) calcium supplementation > 1200 mg/d ( within precede 3 month ) bisphosphonates ( within past 3 yr ) denosumab estrogen ( E ) therapy within past year treatment selective E receptor modulator within past year teriparatide within past yr Clinical history osteoporotic fracture ( vertebral , hip , distal forearm ) Recent ( within past 6 month ) fracture Serum 25hydroxyvitamin D level < 20 ng/ml
